name: eyewear
desc: Round frames can soften the angles of a square face, adding a touch of contrast and balance.

name: hairstyle
desc: A textured quiff with volume on top can help elongate the face and soften the strong jawline.

desc: Light stubble can help soften the angles of a square jawline, creating a more balanced look.

desc: A beanie with a slightly slouchy fit can add some softness to the angles of a square face.

desc: Oval frames can add a soft contrast to the strong angles of a square face, creating a more balanced look.

desc: Soft layers can help soften the angles of a square face, creating a more feminine and balanced look.
